JournalInfos.JournalEntry: New quest added to the journal:

AD13.Name: Accelerator D-13
AD13.Description: A long out of use accelerator model. However, it can still be quite precious.

AccessCard.Name: Access card
AccessCard.Description: It definitely matches the door leading to the locked room in Ramsey's office.

Pistol.Name: Pistol
Pistol.Description: A simple weapon that shoots pure energy.

KillVincent.Name: Beauty and the Beast
KillVincent.Description: Kill 'Amnesia' nightclub owner Vincent Ramsey at the request of his girlfriend, Nyx.

ZedAccelerator.Name: Relic of the Past
ZedAccelerator.Description: Bring Zed an old model of an accelerator. In return you will receive a gun from him.

Prologue.Title: Prologue
Prologue.Subtitle: REQUIEM FOR A DREAM

StoryIntro.INFO_2:
Megacity is a place overrun by poverty and feuding gangs, where powerful
	corporations have the most influence. The violence in the streets is a clear sign of
	an impending war. Government operating from behind the secure walls of City Hall are
	trying to combat this, but so far without success. There are rumors that they themselves
	are secretly supporting the chaos to create a New Order on the ruins of the city.

PrologueDream.INFO_1: Standing at the edge of the tallest tower...
PrologueDream.INFO_3: Falling and falling for what feels like hours...

WakeUpInDarkAlley.INFO_1: You wake up dazed from a restless slumber.
WakeUpInDarkAlley.INFO_2: It was the same dream again...
WakeUpInDarkAlley.INFO_3:
You are somewhere in a dark alley. Above your head, among the smoggy haze, as if torn from
	a dream, rise the monumental skyscrapers of large corporations.
WakeUpInDarkAlley.INFO_4:
Their divine majesty beats
	you to the eyes.
WakeUpInDarkAlley.INFO_5:
Your heart beats so hard that only the stinging touch of the wind protects you from a sudden
	heart attack.
WakeUpInDarkAlley.INFO_6:
Suddenly a wave of shivers comes over your body, you start shaking like an
	aspen, and realize that you are lying on a lair made of some old newspapers.
WakeUpInDarkAlley.INFO_7: When you rise from the ground, you notice a sea of trash around you.
WakeUpInDarkAlley.INFO_8:
It's full of cardboard
	boxes, old mechanical parts, and god knows what else.
WakeUpInDarkAlley.INFO_9: Maybe you will find something interesting there...

Menu1.1: Search the area for something valuable.
Menu1.2: Find the exit from the alley.

AcceleratorFinding.INFO_1: You start rummaging through the trash.
AcceleratorFinding.INFO_2:
The search takes a long while, but eventually you
	manage to find something.
AcceleratorFinding.INFO_3: Hmm, that might come in handy in the future.

OutOfTheAlley.INFO_1: You're not going to rummage through the trash.
OutOfTheAlley.INFO_2:
And that's okay, you probably wouldn't find
	anything there anyway.
OutOfTheAlley.INFO_3:
Instead, you slowly toddle toward the neon color bombs at the end of
	the alley.
OutOfTheAlley.INFO_4: You slowly toddle toward the neon color bombs at the end of the alley.
OutOfTheAlley.INFO_5:
You are getting closer and closer to your goal when from the right, from behind a veil of
	shadows, a low, not very pleasant voice belonging to a man speaks up.
OutOfTheAlley.INFO_6: You stop and turn towards the owner of the voice.
OutOfTheAlley.INFO_7:
His silhouette looms in the darkness. It's
	one of the homeless people who live here. What can he have for you?
OutOfTheAlley.INFO_8: You have a mysterious stranger for nothing. You speed up your step and leave him far behind you.
OutOfTheAlley.INFO_9: Whatever he wanted from you is no longer important.

Menu2.1: Stop and find out what he wants.
Menu2.3: Stop and finally find out what he wants.

Menu3.2: 'I'm just looking around. Where are we actually?'

DialogueWithBob.INFO_1: The shadows in front of you, begin to ripple when your caller stands up.

Prologue.DIA_Bob_8: - 'Don't show up here again if you don't want to get your teeth kicked in!'
Prologue.RememberYourName:
Your name... You start wandering your thoughts around what your name is. As if through a fog
	it occurs to you that you are:
